tool_description: Find the best Instagram hashtags to enhance your posts and increase engagement.

api_list.name: GET New Hashtags
api_list.description: Retrieve 1000 newly generated hashtags for Instagram.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Specify the page number (0 - 9) to retrieve hashtags.

api_list.name: GET Hashtags
api_list.description: Get the 100 most popular Instagram hashtags.

api_list.name: GET Hashtag
api_list.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific hashtag.

required_parameters.name: tag
required_parameters.description: The name of the hashtag to search for.
